aviso.heading: heads up
aviso.paragraph1: everyone here (attendees, exhibitors, volunteers, sponsors) commits to this code. this applies to all indies events, spaces, and platforms (slack, discord, twitter, etc.)

versionCorta.heading: the short version
versionCorta.paragraph1: you know how every community has "that person" who ruins it for everyone?

versionNoTanCorta.heading: the medium version
versionNoTanCorta.paragraph1: we're building a harassment-free space across all our events and platforms (slack, twitter, discord, whatsapp, etc.)
versionNoTanCorta.paragraph2: everyone's welcome regardless of gender, race, sexual orientation, ability, appearance, or beliefs
versionNoTanCorta.paragraph3: harassment or mistreatment in any form gets you banned, full stop. this event and future ones

acoso.heading: what counts as harassment
acoso.paragraph: mistreatment or abuse related to gender, sexual orientation, ability, appearance, experience level, race, or beliefs. also: sexual imagery in public spaces, intimidation, stalking, rude talk interruptions, sharing private info, inappropriate physical contact, and anything that violates someone's privacy, dignity, or safety

comportamientos.heading: unacceptable behavior

items.item1: DMing people without asking in public first
items.item2: explicit, violent, threatening, discriminatory language or content that promotes hate
items.item3: harassing, intimidating, or abusing anyone in the community
items.item4: sharing someone's personal info without permission (doxxing)
items.item7: spam, ads, or unsolicited product pitches
items.item8: bots, scripts, or automation that messes with the community

comportamientos.paragraph: organizers can step in for anything above. violators get kicked from current and future spaces

reporte.paragraph1: if you experience or witness harassment, contact an indies organizer immediately. they'll have visible roles and badges at events
reporte.paragraph2: we'll help you contact authorities if needed and provide whatever support you need

final.heading: we value diversity and inclusion. if you don't vibe with this code or its spirit, please don't participate
